Package com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.cpu

Class CPUState

java.lang.Object
com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.cpu.CPUState
public class CPUState extends Object
Representation of the Chip-8 CPU state. Keeps track of all memory, registers, counters, delays, etc, and include read and set methods for each.

      public void loadMemory(int address, MemoryBlock memory)

      Parameters:
      address - The address in the memory at which the new MemoryBlock will be loaded.
      memory - The MemoryBlock to load into the memory.
